TableField.name: LineBreakPermitID
TableField.phrase: Work Order|The work order associated with the line break activity when applicable

TableField.name: JobNumber
TableField.phrase: Job Number|The unique number assigned to the job requiring a line break. This number is typically assigned by an engineering or maintenance dapartment

TableField.name: PermitNumber
TableField.phrase: Permit Number|The unique number assigned to the permit used for line breaking and placed at the line break area during the event. The permit ID can be used as the permit number because it is a unique, automatically generated, numbering system

TableField.name: WorkOrderID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|Numerical ID to identify and track work orders

ForeignField.name: WOOrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: W.O. Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for this work order

ForeignField.name: WOOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: W.O. Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for this work order

ForeignField.name: WorkOrderNo
ForeignField.phrase: Work Order Number|A unique number assigned to the work order. This number is usually assigned by a maintenance and engineering department and is pre-printed on work order forms

ForeignField.name: WorkOrder
ForeignField.phrase: Work Order|The work order associated with the line break activity when applicable
ForeignField.sample: 3413 | Repair diamond plate walkway on scanner | 02/02/2006 | In Progress

RemoteField.name: RequestTime
RemoteField.phrase: Request Date|The date and time the hot work permit was requested

RemoteField.name: LineBreakTime
RemoteField.phrase: Line Break Date|The date and time the line break is scheduled to occur

TableField.name: LineBreakShiftID
TableField.phrase: Line Break Shift|The shift during which the line break occurred

CodeField.name: LineBreakShift
CodeField.phrase: Line Break Shift|The shift during which the line break occurred

RemoteField.name: ExpirationTime
RemoteField.phrase: Expiration Date|The date and time the line break permit is scheduled to expire and no longer be valid to authorize the line breaking activities

TableField.name: LineBreakID
TableField.phrase: Line Break|A combined field used to describe this line break when issuing line breaking permits

ForeignField.name: OrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization where the line breaking activity occurs

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization where the line breaking activity occurs

ForeignField.name: LocationID
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific area within the facility where the line breaking activity occurs

ForeignField.name: Location
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific area within the facility where the line breaking activity occurs
ForeignField.sample: Cold Storage Receiving Area; Cold Storage No. 6

ForeignField.name: LineBreakTypeID
ForeignField.phrase: Line Break Type|A combined field used to describe this line break type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: LineBreakCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group line breaks of similar types

CodeField.name: LineBreakCategory
CodeField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group line breaks of similar types

ForeignField.name: LineBreakType
ForeignField.phrase: Line Break Type|A combined field used to describe this line break type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: LastReviewDate
ForeignField.phrase: Last Review|The date of the last formal review of the line breaking activity

ForeignField.name: LineBreakTitle
ForeignField.phrase: Line Break Title|A word or short phrase used to identify this specific line breaking activity
ForeignField.sample: High Side Ammonia Line Break Within Warehouse

ForeignField.name: LineBreak
ForeignField.phrase: Line Break|A combined field used to describe this line break when issuing line breaking permits
ForeignField.sample: High Side Ammonia Line Break Within Warehouse, Active Agenda, HQ

ForeignField.name: LineBreakDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A detailed description of this line breaking activity and any special characteristics associated with the break
ForeignField.sample: The high side ammonia line is periodically opened for repair purposes related to evaporator damage from forklifts.

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountableID
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing the risks associated with this line break activity

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing the risks associated with this line break activity

ForeignField.name: FullWorkPhone
ForeignField.phrase: Work Phone|Telephone number of the individual at their place of work with a lable to identify the number

ForeignField.name: Mobile
ForeignField.phrase: Mobile Phone|Mobile telephone number of the individual with a label to identify the number

ForeignField.name: ContactCard
ForeignField.phrase: Accountable Contact|The contact information of the person assigned primary accountability for managing the risks associated with this line break activity

ForeignField.name: EmergencyPhone
ForeignField.phrase: Emergency Phone|Telephone number to be called in the case of a line break emergency

ForeignField.name: LastReviewDate
ForeignField.phrase: Last Review|The date of the last formal review of the line break activity

ForeignField.name: System
ForeignField.phrase: System|The specific system involved in the line breaking activity
ForeignField.sample: Ammonia Refrigeration System; Active Agenda, HQ; 10-28-2003; 1

TableField.name: Explanation
TableField.phrase: Explanation|An explanation of the line breaking activity to be performed
TableField.sample: The mix tank must be sanitized every 3 days. Sanitation of the mix tank requires that a person enter the access hatch at the top of the tank and disassemble the mix augar so that the augar blades may be cleaned and sanitized

TableField.name: KeyLearnings
TableField.phrase: Key Learnings|Information learned during the line breaking activity which may be useful to others performing similar confined space entries in the same or similar area
TableField.sample: The mix augar should be locked out before entering the mix tank. The augar was not locked out and became energized while I was inside the tank. Fortunately someone heard me screaming as I jumped over the augar blade.

TableField.name: SpecialHazards
TableField.phrase: Special Hazards|Special line breaking hazards that should be captured and recorded so that all persons performing similar activities will be aware of the dangers
TableField.sample: The mix augar switch is mislabeled as the 'Intercom Switch' and can result in inadvertent activation of the mix augar by people trying to use the intercom.

RemoteField.name: PermitIssuedByID
RemoteField.phrase: Permit Issued By|The name of the person issuing the line breaking permit

ForeignField.name: PermitIssuedBy
ForeignField.phrase: Permit Issued By|The name of the person issuing the line breaking permit

RemoteField.name: SupervisorID
RemoteField.phrase: Supervisor|The supervisor of the area where the line breaking permit is to occur

ForeignField.name: Supervisor
ForeignField.phrase: Supervisor|The supervisor of the area where the line breaking permit is to occur

TableField.name: PerformerRelationshipID
TableField.phrase: Performer Relationship|The relationship of the person performing the line break activity to the organization where the activity will occur

CodeField.name: PerformerRelationship
CodeField.phrase: Performer Relationship|The relationship of the person performing the line break activity to the organization where the activity will occur

RemoteField.name: PerformedByID
RemoteField.phrase: Performed By|The qualified person performing the actual line breaking activity

ForeignField.name: PerformedBy
ForeignField.phrase: Performed By|The qualified person performing the actual line breaking activity

RemoteField.name: AttendantID
RemoteField.phrase: Attendant|The name of the person assigned to attend the line break and maintain contact with the person performing the break. The attendant is also responsible for maintaining contact with emergency responders and initiating emergency response activities if the person performing the break encounters difficulties

ForeignField.name: Attendant
ForeignField.phrase: Attendant|The name of the person assigned to attend the confined space entry and maintain contact with the entrant. The attendant is also responsible for maintaining contact with emergency responders and initiating emergency response activities if the entry person encounters difficulties

RemoteField.name: AtmosphereTesterID
RemoteField.phrase: Atmosphere Tester|The name of the person conducting atmosphere testing and monitoring of the environment adjacent to the line break area

ForeignField.name: AtmosphereTester
ForeignField.phrase: Atmosphere Tester|The name of the person conducting atmosphere testing and monitoring of the environment adjacent to the line break area

RemoteField.name: ERTMemberID
RemoteField.phrase: Emergency Response Team Member|The name of the emergency response team member that has been contacted in advance of the line break and who remains available in the event that a containment response or emergency rescue becomes necessary

ForeignField.name: ERTMember
ForeignField.phrase: Emergency Response Team Member|The name of the emergency response team member that has been contacted in advance of the line break and who remains available in the event that a containment response or emergency rescue becomes necessary

ForeignField.name: ERTFullWorkPhone
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Work Phone|Telephone number of the individual at their place of work with a lable to identify the number

ForeignField.name: ERTMobile
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Mobile Phone|Mobile telephone number of the individual with a label to identify the number

ForeignField.name: ERTFullPager
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Pager|Pager number and PIN of the individual

ForeignField.name: ERTContactCard
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Contact|The contact information of the emergency response team member assigned to monitor the line break activity

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: LineBreakPermit
CombinedField.phrase: Line Break Permit|A combined field used to describe this line break permit when associating it with related records
CombinedField.sample: LBP113, 09-21-2003; Ammonia Refigeration; Active Agenda, HQ

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
